actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the banning of the high seas netting for salmon.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the ocean netting of salmon is destructive and wasteful. Calls for measures to prevent such practices. Expresses the sense of Congress that the Secretary of State work for a worldwide ban on such fishing methods.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the banning of the high seas netting for salmon.
